bibl.title: "Kilns" from the Ptolemaic Period in Tell Atrib.
bibl.note: Excavations in 1987-1990 led to the discovery of more than 10 kilns in different states of preservation. - Pp. 294-307: M. D. and J. R., "Kilns" from Tell Atrib - Preliminary Results of Physic-Chemical Examinations of their Walls.
bibl.seg: SCHOLL Tomasz, Malgorzata DASZKIEWICZ and Jerzy RAABE, "Kilns" from the Ptolemaic Period in Tell Atrib.

Excavations in 1987-1990 led to the discovery of more than 10 kilns in different states of preservation. - Pp. 294-307: M. D. and J. R., "Kilns" from Tell Atrib - Preliminary Results of Physic-Chemical Examinations of their Walls.
